properties.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 3:34PM AKST until January 26 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to
13 inches.

* WHERE...Yakutat.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 PM AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy,
wet snow will be difficult to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times late this
evening and may mix with rain briefly late tonight before going
back to snow Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY
